markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 16"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Misleading](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1834)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Illusion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=92" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 13 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 8,000 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** etched onto light armor

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This rune attempts to obfuscate your location through illusory trickery. When you're [concealed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=4), the DC of the flat check to target you with an effect is 6 instead of 5.

<document level="2" id="action-1528" />

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Misleading
